      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_81218</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Planètes tournant autour du soleil le long de leurs orbites circulaires</string>
            <string language="en">Planets revolving around the Sun along their circular orbits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Planeten, die um die Sonne entlang ihren 
kreisförmigen Bahnen rotieren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planetas que revolvem em torno do sol ao longo de
suas órbitas circulares</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pianeti che girano intorno al sole lungo le loro 
orbite circolari</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πλανήτες που περιστρέφονται γύρω από τον ήλιο κατά 
μήκος των κυκλικών τροχιών τους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Planetas que giran alrededor del sol a lo largo 
de sus órbitas circulares</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre Mars, Mercure, Vénus, la Terre et Jupiter tournant le long de leurs orbites circulaires et de leurs distances à partir du soleil en années terrestres.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows Mars, Mercury, Venus, Earth and Jupiter revolving along their circular orbits and their distances from the Sun in Earth years.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">distances</string>
            <string language="en">distances</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Jupiter</string>
            <string language="en">Jupiter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Mars</string>
            <string language="en">Mars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Mercure</string>
            <string language="en">Mercury</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">orbites</string>
            <string language="en">Orbits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">planètes</string>
            <string language="en">Planets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">le soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Vénus</string>
            <string language="en">Venus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">années</string>
            <string language="en">years</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt Mars, Quecksilber, Venus, 
Masse und Jupiter, der entlang ihren Rundschreibenbahnen und ihren 
Abständen von der Sonne in den Masse Jahren rotiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra Marte, mercúrio, Venus,
terra e Jupiter que revolve ao longo de suas órbitas da circular e de
suas distâncias do sol em anos da terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra Marte, mercurio, 
Venus, terra e Jupiter che gira lungo le loro orbite della 
circonvallazione e le loro distanze dal sole durante gli anni della 
terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τον Αρη, υδράργυρος, την 
Αφροδίτη, γη και Δία που περιστρέφονται κατά μήκος των κυκλικών 
τροχιών τους και των αποστάσεών τους από τον ήλιο στα γήινα 
έτη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra Marte, mercurio, Venus,
tierra y Júpiter que gira a lo largo de sus órbitas de la circular y
de sus distancias del sol en años de la tierra.</string>
          </description>
